name: sync-object
description: Make a GameObject multiplayer-synced with Normcore
prompt:
I want to make this GameObject synchronized across multiplayer. Please:

1. Ask me which GameObject(s) to sync
2. Add RealtimeView component
3. Add RealtimeTransform for position/rotation sync
4. Ask if I need custom property sync (e.g., color, health, state)
5. If yes, create a custom RealtimeComponent<T> for the properties
6. Explain the ownership model and how changes will sync

Follow Normcore's synchronization patterns and best practices.
